author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Altisource Portfolio Solutions Says On May 8, Unit Entered Amendment To Previously Disclosed Non-Binding Loi
text:
May 15 (Reuters) - Altisource Portfolio Solutions SA :
* ALTISOURCE PORTFOLIO SOLUTIONS SA-ON MAY 8, UNIT, NEW RESIDENTIAL INVESTMENT ENTERED AMENDMENT TO PREVIOUSLY DISCLOSED NON-BINDING LOI DATED AUGUST 28
* ALTISOURCE PORTFOLIO-AMENDMENT EXTENDS SERVICES TERM LOI THROUGH JUNE 15 WHICH PERIOD TO BE AUTOMATICALLY EXTENDED THROUGH JUNE 30, 2018 - SEC FILING Source bit.ly/2Kto1eD Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
